"Sword":
"A Sword is a melee weapon which strikes a balance between attack range and damage, making it very easy to use.

You can use its \"Guard\" Weapon Action to reduce the damage you take. If you activate Guard right before you take a hit, it becomes a more powerful \"Just Guard\"."

"The PA \"Spiral Edge\" can deal high damage to a single enemy.

The more you charge it, the more damage you deal."
